title: Self-Healing Data
description: Every block is checksummed. ZFS automatically repairs corruption using parity.

title: Open Hardware
description: No proprietary RAID cards or vendor lock-in. Use standard HBAs.

title: Intelligent Tiering
description: Hot data on NVMe SSDs - cold data on HDDs. Flash speed at HDD prices.

title: Native Encryption
description: AES-256-GCM encryption at dataset level with zero performance penalty.

title: Instant Snapshots
description: Thousands of point-in-time snapshots with zero performance impact.

title: Built-in Replication
description: Async or sync replication with block-level deduplication.
